statements: SELECT * FROM user_consent;
SELECT user_id, consent_date FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, consent_given FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT consent_date, user_id, consent_given FROM user_consent ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, consent_date FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, consent_date FROM user_consent WHERE consent_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_consent WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' AND consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_consents FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_consent;
SELECT user_id, consent_type FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT consent_type, consent_given_at FROM user_consent ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, consent_type, consent_given_at FROM user_consent WHERE consent_type = 'Marketing' AND user_id = 3;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM data_processing_activity WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, consent_type, consent_given_at FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, consent_type FROM user_consent WHERE consent_given_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, consent_type, consent_given_at FROM user_consent WHERE consent_type LIKE 'Marketing%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, consent_type, consent_given_at, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_consent JOIN data_processing_activity ON user_consent.user_id = data_processing_activity.user_id;
SELECT user_id, consent_type, activity_description FROM user_consent LEFT JOIN data_processing_activity ON user_consent.user_id = data_processing_activity.user_id WHERE activity_id IS NULL;

SELECT consent_description, consent_given_at FROM user_consent ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT activity_description FROM data_processing_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Data Analysis';
SELECT user_id, data_content FROM user_data WHERE data_collection_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY data_collection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_consent JOIN user_data ON user_consent.user_id = user_data.user_id;
SELECT user_id, consent_description, consent_given_at FROM user_consent WHERE consent_valid_until > NOW() ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, consent_description FROM user_consent WHERE user_id IN (1,2,3) AND consent_given_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY data_collection_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, consent_description FROM user_consent WHERE consent_description ILIKE '%cookies%'
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM data_processing_activity WHERE activity_type = 'analytics' ORDER BY activity_start_time DESC

SELECT user_id, activity_id, consent_given FROM user_consent WHERE user_id = '123';
SELECT activity_description, data_category FROM data_processing_activity ORDER BY activity_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM consent_history WHERE consent_revoked = true;

SELECT user_id, activity_id, consent_timestamp FROM user_consent ORDER BY consent_timestamp DESC;

SELECT * FROM user_personal_data;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_personal_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM data_processing_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, consent_status FROM user_consent_logs WHERE consent_status = TRUE;

SELECT full_name, email FROM user_personal_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE;

SELECT up.full_name, dp.activity_name, uc.consent_status FROM user_personal_data up JOIN user_consent_logs uc ON up.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN data_processing_activities dp ON uc.activity_id = dp.activity_id;
SELECT up.*, dpc.category_name FROM user_personal_data up JOIN data_processing_categories dpc ON up.user_id = dpc.category_id WHERE up.user_id = 12345;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message, notification_sent_date FROM user_data_notifications ORDER BY notification_sent_date DESC;
